tools.desc: One-line council launcher (recommended UX).
Canonical multi-agent orchestrator (run-dir engine).
Executes one agent seat; hybrid router (cloud/local) with guardrails.
Selects/injects external skills from ~/.codex and ~/.gemini.
Writes state/manifest.json for machine-checkable budgets/plan.
Compiles a 3..7 role team for the prompt (reduces swarm chaos).
Writes state/agent_cards.json (A2A-style 'Agent Cards' for dynamic routing/team introspection).
Repairs missing DECISION_JSON by re-running only failing seats.
Applies ```diff blocks from best agent output with guardrails.
Runs verification pipeline after patches (strict mode supported).
Async council bus (propose/claim/ack decisions + hygiene sweep).
Scores prior runs for contract compliance + failure signals.
Bounded multi-retriever pack (code/docs/memory) injected into prompts.
Appends an approval record (HITL) to state/approvals.jsonl for a specific action_id.
Writes STOP flags to stop runs/agents.
Receives A2A payloads (stdin/file) and enqueues into ramshare/state/a2a/inbox with idempotency + ACK.
Processes ramshare/state/a2a/inbox and executes a2a.v2 action_payload (default-off; enable with GEMINI_OP_REMOTE_EXEC_ENABLE=1).
Routes A2A payloads into a local WSL distro via stdin (no SSH).
Runs health checks, parses results, and generates a structured Markdown report.
Queues or runs the finance_council multi-agent skillset (technical/fundamental/sentiment/risk/execution).
Queues or runs theme-driven stock research for any finance theme and returns ranked non-portfolio candidates.
tools.example: python scripts/market_theme_run.py --theme \"best ai micro investments for this week\" --run-now

tools.desc: Builds a reusable style profile from local artwork ZIP/folder for Redbubble product generation consistency.
Runs multi-cycle style calibration + variety testing to tune generator overrides toward reference linework metrics.
Scans local + live Redbubble sources to build duplicate-prevention catalog cache.
Runs the Art Syndicate council loop (trend hunter -> generator -> compliance/quality/SEO council -> packet).
Converts a real landmark/building photo into your Redbubble-ready line-art style with iterative scoring + preview output.
